did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Jane Clewe was a donor and member of many activist and community organizations devoted to lesbian and women's issues. This collection contains newsletters and organizational materials from many of these organizations as well as a large collection of magazines from the 1990's related to lesbian and women's issues.
did.physloc: COLLECTION STORED OFF-SITE AT SRLF: Open for research. Advance notice required for access. Contact the UCLA Library Special Collections Reference Desk for paging information.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: COLLECTION STORED OFF-SITE AT SRLF: Open for research. Advance notice required for access. Contact the UCLA Library Special Collections Reference Desk for paging information.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use and Reproduction
userestrict.p: Property rights to the physical object belong to UCLA Library Special Collections. Literary rights, including copyright, are retained by the creators and their heirs. It is the responsibility of the researcher to determine who holds the copyright and pursue the copyright owner or his or her heir for permission to publish where The UC Regents do not hold the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Jane Clewe papers (Collection 2190). UCLA Library Special Collections, Charles E. Young Research Library, UCLA.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The June L. Mazer Lesbian Archive at UCLA is an outreach and collection-building partnership between the June L. Mazer Lesbian Archives, the UCLA Center for the Study of Women (CSW) and the UCLA Library. These collections expand the pool of primary source materials available to researchers and to the community at large. This partnership was initiated by CSW and is funded by the National Endowment for the Humanities (NEH) to inventory, organize, preserve, and digitize more than eighty Mazer collections pertaining to lesbian and feminist activism and writings.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Provenance unknown. This collection is part of an outreach and collection-building partnership between the June L. Mazer Lesbian Archives, the UCLA Center for the Study of Women (CSW) and the UCLA Library.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Jane Clewe was a graduate of Princeton University, Class of 1977. She lived with her partner Debbie in Los Angeles, California and enjoyed hiking, scuba and other outdoors activities. She was an active member of the Wilderness Women and a donor and member of many activist and community organizations devoted to lesbian and women's issues.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains materials collected and maintained by Jane Clewe, including a substantial number of magazines from the 1990s focused on women's and lesbian issues. It also includes newsletters and communication from a number of activist and community organizations devoted to lesbian and gay issues in Los Angeles, California.
Programs and calendars for women in martial arts groups and events.
Flyers, mock-ups, schedules and organizational documents.
Coverage of Connexxus in Frontiers Magazine.
Promotional materials for the film Cynara.
Programs from various gay pride events in Los Angeles and Orange County.
Newsletters from various lesbian and feminist activist organizations and community centers.
Newsletters from various lesbian and feminist activist and community groups.
Clippings from various news sources compiling stories focused on gay and lesbian stories and issues.
Newsletters from various community and activist organizations related to feminist and/or lesbian and gay issues.
Issues 214, 218, 222 and 223 of Christopher Street Magazine.
Newsletter of Lambda Legal Defense and Education Fund.
Newsletters from various community and activist organizations related to feminist and/or lesbian and gay issues.
-B-Man No. 17, January 1990 -Teaching Tolerance, Spring 1995 and Spring 2005 -The Advocate, June 2004 -Night Life Issue 623, October 1994
Flyers, information and publications related to Camping Women.
Issues contained: January 2001, February 2001, April 2001, August 2001, February 2003
Issues contained: March 1995, February 2000, March 2000, May 2000, September 2000, November 2000, December 2000
Mailings, catalogs and various newsletters.
Contains issues of Curve Magazine 1998-2003 and issues of Ms. Magazine 1998-2005.
Issues of Girlfriends Magazine 1999-2004.
Flyers for gay and lesbian social and activist gatherings around Southern California.
Weekly updates and networking opportunities for Princeton Alumni.
Weekly updates and networking opportunities for Princeton Alumni.
Weekly updates and networking opportunities for Princeton Alumni.

Weekly updates and networking opportunities for Princeton Alumni.
Various mailings and communication through the Princeton Alumni network.

Contains T-shirts from lesbian organizations throughout the 1970s and 1980s as well as small press books and poetry collections focused on lesbian lives and experiences. Full container list included in box.
